screeningSummary: Former federal contractor describing domestic surveillance infrastructure - predictive behavioral analysis

textVariants.text: You're on the air. You've got some inside knowledge?
Alright, you're on. Some inside knowledge, huh?
YOU ARE ON THE AIR! With INSIDE KNOWLEDGE! This is GONNA be GOOD!
You're on. Let me guess - you know government secrets?
You're on. So you've got inside knowledge? What about it?
Oh, you have INSIDE KNOWLEDGE! This I gotta hear!
You're on. What specific knowledge do you possess regarding government operations?

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Eight years as a federal contractor, Vern. I can't say which agency, but I've seen how the surveillance apparatus actually works from the inside.

textVariants.text: What can you tell us about the surveillance programs?
Eight years... alright, what can you tell us?
EIGHT YEARS as a FEDERAL CONTRACTOR! This is AMAZING!
Eight years. Let me guess - they're watching everything?
Eight years. Fine, what've you got?
EIGHT YEARS of seeing the SURVEILLANCE APPARATUS! This is PERFECT!
Federal contracting duration: eight years. What specific surveillance methodologies have you observed?

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: What Snowden revealed was real, but it was also a controlled leak. The scope of domestic monitoring is far beyond what was disclosed. Every smart device, every phone with a microphone, every car with GPS - it's all being collected and processed.

textVariants.text: Processing for what purpose?
Processing... for what purpose?
EVERY SMART DEVICE! EVERY PHONE! EVERY CAR! This is TERRIFYING!
Processing for what purpose? Security? Control?
Processing for what purpose?
EVERYTHING is being COLLECTED and PROCESSED! This is the BIGGEST story!
Data collection and processing objectives. What specific purposes drive the surveillance infrastructure?

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Predictive analysis. Behavioral prediction. They can identify potential threats before those threats even formulate. The infrastructure is built, the algorithms are running, and the oversight is minimal.

textVariants.text: This has all been alleged before. Without documentation, it's just testimony.
This has all been said before... without docs, it's just words...
PREDICTIVE ANALYSIS of BEHAVIOR! This is TERRIFYING but INTRIGUING!
This has all been alleged before. What's your proof?
Allegations without docs... what's your evidence?
This is INCREDIBLE! But we need DOCUMENTATION!
Predictive behavioral analysis. These allegations require documentary evidence for verification.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: I understand the skepticism. I was a skeptic too before I saw the systems myself. But I've taken precautions and I'm speaking out because people deserve to know what's being done in their name.

textVariants.text: Thank you for coming forward. Be careful out there. Your anonymity matters.
Yeah, thanks for calling. Be careful. These people are serious.
THANK YOU for your COURAGE! BE CAREFUL out there!
Right, well... be careful. Thanks for calling.
Good report. Be careful. Thanks.
This is HEROIC! Thank you for SPEAKING OUT! BE CAREFUL!
Whistleblowing carries significant personal risk. Protective measures are essential. Thank you for your courage.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Thank you, Vern. People deserve to know what's happening. That's why I took the risk to call.

arcNotes: Former federal contractor, surveillance infrastructure details, moral objection, personal risk
